H0.text: Which river is most sacred to the Hindu religion. Yamunā

H1.text: Which river is most sacred to the Hindu religion. Sarasvatī

H2.text: Which river is most sacred to the Hindu religion. Narmadā

H3.text: Which river is most sacred to the Hindu religion. Gaṅgā

A4.text: The Ganges is the most sacred river to Hindus.

A5.text: The Ganges is worshipped as the goddess Ganga in Hinduism.
